description.value:
Lasts 2d5 Rounds, all Melee Attacks gain Vengeful (7) If under affects of another Eldar Drug, must make -20 Toughness Test. If failed drug has no effect and suffer 1d10 Energy Damage ignoring armour and Toughness, and gain 1d5 Corruption.

Effect: Extremely Rare

Notes: -
